content:
Requirements for disconnected nodes

  • Disconnected operation

    • Provides caching and resynchronization of data between the node and the fixed repositories.

  • Resolving relationships

    • Must be able to identify information that has been cached on mutually disconnected nodes.

  • Synchronization

    • Updates on one node in the enclave should be reflected in others.
